arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim makes Andre Onana feelings clear in cryptic response to Grimsby humiliation
arts.sum: Manchester United boss Ruben Amorim refused to single out individuals in the aftermath of Wednesday night's humbling defeat to Grimsby Town in the Carabao Cup second round

arts.ttl: Fans blast Man United manager Ruben Amorim for bizarre antics on touchline with his side 2-0 down to League Two minnows Grimsby - as Red Devils suffer Carabao Cup humiliation
arts.sum: Amorim, 40, was bizarrely captured during Sky Sports' broadcast of the encounter, shifting several small magnets on a tactics board in the dugout during the 62nd minute of the match.

arts.ttl: Chris Sutton claims Ruben Amorim made an 'error' before Manchester United even kicked off against Grimsby Town
Grimsby Town’s Christy Pym jokes after Carabao Cup win: ‘I’m a Man Utd fan so I’m fuming a little bit’
arts.sum: The goalkeeper added it “had not sunk in” after his side knocked Manchester United out of the Carabao Cup

arts.ttl: Carabao Cup third round draw LIVE: Man Utd, Arsenal and Liverpool discover opponents
arts.sum: The Premier League's European contingent enter the Carabao Cup at the third round stage meaning that Arsenal and Liverpool will both be joining Manchester United in the third round draw should the Red Devils find a way past Grimsby Town

arts.ttl: Man United Look to Kickstart Season Against Grimsby Town in Carabao Cup
arts.sum: For Amorim, this match is about more than progression in the Carabao Cup. It represents a chance to calm early doubts, to rotate his squad, and to inject belief into a side that has yet to find rhythm under his guidance. Manchester United will be looking to secure their first victory of the season when they travel to face League Two side Grimsby Town in the Carabao Cup .

arts.ttl: Manchester United XI vs Grimsby Town – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Manchester United travel to face League Two side Grimsby Town on Wednesday night, desperately needing a victory to kick-start their season. After a winless start in the Premier League, this Carabao Cup tie is a crucial opportunity for Rúben Amorim to build confidence, though he is expected to rotate his starting eleven.
